greeting: Hi, <g:message args='${[firstName]}'/>. Please share your experience.
greeting-style: font-family: Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 24px; color:#212121; word-break: keep-all; line-height: 1.25; margin-top: 30px; padding: 0 30px;
greeting2: It will help other shoppers and we'll use it to improve our products.
greeting2-style: font-family: Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 20px; color:#4c4c4c; word-break: keep-all; line-height: 1.25; margin-top: 30px; padding: 0 30px;
product-title-style: font-family:Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size:18px; color:#212121; margin: 15px 0;
photo-teaser: How did it look in real life?
photo-teaser-style: font-family:Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size:18px; color:#212121; margin: 15px 0;
photo-button-style: font-size:14px; font-weight: bold; font-family:Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, sans-serif; color:#ffffff; text-decoration:none; letter-spacing:1px;background:black;display:inline-block;border-radius: 3px;width:180px;height:40px;line-height:40px;mso-border-alt:2px solid black;
